Anterior Commissure of CIVM postnatal ra.SuperCategory: CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas parcellation scheme region
Anterior Commissure of CIVM postnatal ra.Is part of: Major White Matter Structures of CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas
Anterior Commissure of CIVM postnatal ra.Definition: The anterior commissure is very easily segmented on horizontal T2w MRI. The dense white matter of the anterior commissure is much darker than surrounding tissue on T2w MRI and the entire structure can be segmented using a simple seeded threshold (magic wand) tool. The posterior limbs tend to be slightly lighter than the anterior limbs, but are still readily distinguishable from surrounding tissue.
